resources.string: Level0 \'Recruit\'. You turned into a vampire. You haunted by the evil hawk, you can not harm him, and he can kill you only when you are in flight. All other creatures are mortal. Survive 2 moons and 2 suns. Knew: Blood = Life, fairies blood = protection from the sun
Level1 \'Ripper\'. 2 moons and 2 suns don\'t use bottles with blood, it clear timer of moons and suns if using bottles
Level2 \'Collector\'. Collect 3 dancing flowers, 2 bottles with fairies blood and 1 with true blood. Don\'t kill wizards.
Level3 \'Diplomat\'. Overfly ground enemies 2 moon and sun 2. Joining the fight will reset the counter
Level4 \'Fairies\' man\'. 2 moon and sun 2 kill all creatures except the fairies. Pity = counter resetting.
Congratulations! From now on nobody will say that you were born yesterday =)
Vegetarianism and pacifism - is not your strong point. You showed yourself as a real ripper
You left a local homeless without glassware - they have to go to the robbery. But wizards in gratitude to loyalty for them, made ​​in flasks decoction of flowers, slowing blood loss. Now you hardier.
What maneuverability! From now on the wings you move 2 times faster
Fairies are delighted that no one of their sisters died in the last couple days. And even more pleased that died a bunch of other creatures. They offer you a ring that slows the combustion process.
There are no new tasks yet
Not worth it to sit on a diet - this life, not a school for ballerina
Sun protection over and vampire has burned.
Steak of vampire is not the most appetizing sight. Next time drink blood fairies and do not overdo it with a tan.
